title: Early Black Friday price cut drops M4 Pro MacBook Pro down to $1,749
description: The brand-new M4 Pro MacBook Pro 14-inch has hit a new record low price of $1,749, with units in stock with free expedited shipping. This pre-Black Friday Apple deal may sell out or end soon, with limited supply available at the reduced price.Grab the best price on Apple's M4 MacBook Pro.The $250 price cut on the standard M4 Pro MacBook Pro 14-inch knocks the price down to a new all-time low of $1,749. Equipped with a 12-core CPU, 16-core GPU, 24GB unified memory and 512GB of storage, the standard model in your choice of Space Black or Silver offers a good deal of performance for the sub-$1,750 price point.Get the $1,749 MBP deal Continue Reading on AppleInsider | Discuss on our Forums
author: Christine McKee
excerpt: The brand-new M4 Pro MacBook Pro 14-inch has hit a new record low price of $1,749, with units in stock with free expedited shipping. This pre-Black Friday Apple deal may sell out or end soon, with limited supply available at the reduced price.
text: Grab the best price on Apple's M4 MacBook Pro. The brand-new M4 Pro MacBook Pro 14-inch has hit a new record low price of $1,749, with units in stock with free expedited shipping. This pre-Black Friday Apple deal may sell out or end soon, with limited supply available at the reduced price. The $250 price cut on the standard M4 Pro MacBook Pro 14-inch knocks the price down to a new all-time low of $1,749. Equipped with a 12-core CPU, 16-core GPU, 24GB unified memory and 512GB of storage, the standard model in your choice of Space Black or Silver offers a good deal of performance for the sub-$1,750 price point. B&H is also throwing in free expedited shipping within the contiguous U.S., and its store card, dubbed Payboo, has some unique perks to consider as well. Shoppers can get a sales tax refund in qualifying states or opt for special financing to spread the payments out over time.
html:
Grab the best price on Apple's M4 MacBook Pro.

The brand-new M4 Pro MacBook Pro 14-inch has hit a new record low price of $1,749, with units in stock with free expedited shipping. This pre-Black Friday Apple deal may sell out or end soon, with limited supply available at the reduced price.

The $250 price cut on the standard M4 Pro MacBook Pro 14-inch knocks the price down to a new all-time low of $1,749. Equipped with a 12-core CPU, 16-core GPU, 24GB unified memory and 512GB of storage, the standard model in your choice of Space Black or Silver offers a good deal of performance for the sub-$1,750 price point.

B&H is also throwing in free expedited shipping within the contiguous U.S., and its store card, dubbed Payboo, has some unique perks to consider as well. Shoppers can get a sales tax refund in qualifying states or opt for special financing to spread the payments out over time.
